article_title: Scapegoating Shinseki Will Not Solve The Underlying Problem Facing The Veteran Health Administration

article_metadata.description: Beyond misreporting performance measures, the long wait times facing veterans are not unique to the VA. The challenging underlying problem of queuing is inherent to public subsidy programs and applies to Medicaid, Medicare, and even highways and airports.
article_metadata.author: Tomas Philipson
